sideline.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a line at the side of a sports field, which shows where the players are allowed to play
sideline.translation[1].definitions[0].d: if you are sidelined, you are unable to play in a sports game because you are injured, or unable to take part in an activity because you are not as good as someone else
